title: Easy DVD Creator 2.5.2 [NepsterJay]
description:
Easy DVD Creator - a simple and convenient tool to convert AVI / DIVX / XVID / DIV, MPEG / MPG / DAT, WMV / ASF / ASX, RM / RMVB, MOV / QT, 3GP/3G2, MP4/M4V, and FLV to DVD you can watch in your home DVD-player. With Easy DVD Creator, you can make movies about your travels, weddings, celebrations in the home DVD, which you can show friends and family! Just add video files into the file list and click "Start" 

Key features: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create DVD from AVI, DIVX, XVID, DIV, MPEG, MPG, DAT, WMV, ASF, ASX, RM, RMVB, MOV, QT, 3GP, 3G2, MP4, M4V, FLV, and TOD files and burn a blank DVD drive. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create DVD-image and save to your hard drive. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Burn DVD-image from the hard disk onto a blank DVD-ROM. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Extremely fast conversion speed, thanks to support multi-core processors. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Merge up to 3 hours movies or episodic files to one DVD. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multithreading and batch conversion supported. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Very easy to use, just one click is enough to burn DVD. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for DVD-R, DVD + R, DVD-RW, DVD + RW, as well as 8.5GB DVD-ROM drive. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports configuration of NTSC / PAL, the ratio 4:3 and 16:9 video. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ All encoders / codec are built-in. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simple graphical user interface. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ No ASPI drivers are not needed.
